item.title: Ethereum Experiences Short-Term Rebound, Surges Above $4300
item.description: On August 19th, based on HTX market data, Ethereum witnessed a short-term rebound and broke above $4300. It is currently trading at $4294.

item.title: Goldman Sachs: Fed Expected to Cut Rates by 25 Basis Points in September, Five-Year Treasury Notes are the Best Trade Before Rate Cut
item.description: On August 19th, Shifrin, the Global Head of Banking and Markets Strategy at Goldman Sachs, stated that while the Federal Reserve may cut rates, the five-year U.S. Treasury bond is currently the most attractive trading option. He pointed out that a yield range of 3%-4% for the five-year bond is a level worthy of investment and can also provide protection during periods of rising market risk.The current yield on the five-year U.S. Treasury bond is 3.85%, which is significantly lower than 4.38% at the beginning of the year. A Reuters survey shows that 61% of economists expect the Fed to cut the benchmark interest rate by 25 basis points to the 4%-4.25% range at the September meeting.Goldman Sachs predicts that considering the slowdown in real GDP growth and the rise in the unemployment rate, the Fed may start a rate cut cycle in the fourth quarter of 2025 and continue with accommodative policies in 2026, ultimately adjusting the policy rate to the 3%-3.25% level. (FXStreet)

item.title: Bitget's AI Trading Assistant GetAgent is now fully open, supporting three intelligent modes
item.description: On August 19th, Bitget's self-developed comprehensive crypto trading AI assistant, "GetAgent," officially opened for full access and launched three levels of services: Free, Plus, and Ultra, aiming to meet the trading needs of different user groups. Previously, around 25,000 users were waiting in line to apply for an invitation code for a trial. To celebrate the official launch, a limited-time experience sharing event is now in progress. Participants have the chance to win a 30-day free trial of the Plus membership.In terms of benefits, the Free tier adopts a zero-threshold model that is accessible to all users. It supports basic functions such as K-line analysis of the top 50 popular coins and contract trading strategy recommendations. The Plus membership is open to trading VIP1-3 level users, high-quality agents, or can be opened by paying 5 BGB per month. It is worth noting that early participants will receive a 1-month free trial qualification. This tier includes a daily limit of

item.title: Established by non-profit organizations supported by Coinbase, Uniswap, and others, the AIP aims to educate US legislators about cryptocurrency
item.description: August 19th. As reported by The Block, the American Innovation Project (AIP) was initiated on Tuesday with the backing of industry heavyweights like Coinbase and Uniswap Labs. Their shared objective is to assist U.S. policymakers in comprehending the swift evolution of emerging technologies such as crypto and artificial intelligence.A statement indicated that the project aims to facilitate "dialogue on policy and technological matters that have an impact on America's economic future."It is reported that several entities specializing in cryptocurrency are supporting the AIP, including Kraken, Coinbase, the Blockchain Association, Paradigm, the Solana Policy Institute, and DCG. The organization is said to have received seed funding from the Cedar Innovation Foundation and a $1 million grant from the Crypto Group.

item.title: A trader deposited $1,000,000 into Hyperliquid and went long on ETH, BTC, and PUMP with maximum leverage.
item.description: On August 19th, as monitored by LookOnChain, the cryptocurrency trader 0x0a07 from the prediction platform Shuffle deposited 1 million USDC into Hyperliquid today and initiated maximum leverage long positions on ETH, BTC, and PUMP.

item.title: glassnode: Bitcoin Market Sees Continued New Demand, Limited Panic Selling Pressure
item.description: August 19th. Based on glassnode data, over the past 5 days, the holdings of first-time Bitcoin buyers have increased by 1.0% and reached 4.93 million BTC, suggesting sustained market demand. During the same period, the positions of strong hand holders grew by 10.1% and reached 1.03 million BTC. However, the growth rate is significantly slower compared to April.It is worth noting that the positions of profit-taking holders increased by 5.4% and reached 1.83 million BTC, marking the largest increase this year. Meanwhile, although the number of loss-making sellers has increased by 37.8%, the overall actual loss remains relatively moderate, indicating limited market panic.

item.title: Benet: The implementation of the GENIUS Act is crucial to ensuring the United States' leadership in the digital asset space.
item.description: On August 19th, the U.S. Treasury Department issued a Notice of Proposed Rulemaking in line with the requirements of the GENIUS Act today.In response, U.S. Treasury Secretary Benson declared that the implementation of the GENIUS Act is of great significance in ensuring America's leadership in the digital asset field. Stablecoins will widen the usage channels of the U.S. dollar to billions of people worldwide and lead to a substantial increase in the demand for U.S. bonds that support stablecoins. "For all parties involved, this is a situation that is beneficial to all - stablecoin users, stablecoin issuers, and the U.S. Treasury Department."

item.title: Investment Bank Outlook for Jackson Hole Conference Shows Significant Rate Cut Expectation Differentiation
item.description: On August 19th, Federal Reserve Chairman Powell is scheduled to deliver a speech on the economic outlook and the assessment of the Fed's policy framework at the annual central bank symposium of the Kansas City Fed in Jackson Hole, Wyoming at 10 am Eastern Time (10 pm Beijing Time) on August 22nd. Major investment banks hold the following expectations for Powell's speech:UBS: It is anticipated that Powell may lay the groundwork for a rate cut commencing in September and persisting through the end of the year.UBS: Considering last week's data, Powell may be inclined to hint at the Fed's propensity to cut rates during the September meeting.Russell Investments: The Jackson Hole meeting may temper expectations for a Fed rate cut. A September rate cut is "possible" rather than "certain", with a 25-basis-point cut rather than a 50-basis-point cut.ING: Recently, three Fed officials (Daly, Cook, and Kashkari) expressed concerns about the deterioration of the labor market, which seems to

item.title: Swedish cryptocurrency exchange company Safello will launch a physically-backed TAO ETP.
item.description: August 19th. According to Marketscreener, the Swedish crypto exchange company Safello declared that it is going to launch the first physically-backed TAO exchange-traded product (ETP) in the European market. This ETP is scheduled to be listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, the Paris and Amsterdam pan-European exchanges, as well as the Xetra exchange in Germany, thus enabling institutional and retail investors to gain exposure to the Bittensor native token TAO.

item.title: Cryptocurrency Exchange LBank May Launch Plan to Go Public in the US
item.description: On August 19th, according to the crypto KOL @_FORAB, a certain exchange (as shown in the attached image, which might be LBank) is going to launch a plan to list in the United States. The platform "issued 250 shares of common stock to invited employees and asked them to register with their passports and identification. However, due to regulatory reasons, employees with mainland Chinese passports are unable to participate in the common stock incentive."
